segments.text: Mr Edgar , hello ! How's business ? Still booming ? What can we do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm here to get some help from you . I was hoping to have someone who we can deal with exclusively . On a long-term basis , if that's possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What we can do is to assign you a customer manager , that way you can just deal with him . You don't need to deal with anyone else .
segments.speaker: S1
